special.message: **M3D** ate out of the can!
blocked with the trash can lid!
**Kunai's** expertise allowed him to strike twice!
**The weapon grows stronger in **VHS Tape's** hands!
**Eduardo_Hook** took a sip of the Label!
Clearly, his opponent didn't own an airfryer
**The order was incorrect, but **DarkSlash** ate some anyway!
His mother would be proud
blocked with their shield!
**diego** used the jar, try not to think about it
Somehow **EnzoMenso's** stomach is stronger than the meat mountain!
The pin has been pulled, there's no escape!
**EXSeraph's** immense hatred allows him to strike two more times!
Those potato oles are seriously delicious!

Legendary.name: NERF Fortnite AR-L Elite Dart Blaster

special.message: **super_hats** put on the super hat!
**Senna** runs his blood along the ticket, a portal to Brazil opens under his opponent!
With no regard for Chasem, **McLovin** throws his pc with all he's got!
**Trazac's** talent at wrangling cattle shines!
blocked with Yenice's Liver!
**Nakkiel** makes a withdrawal from Disco's Wallet
**Nakkiel** stunts on the opponent, dropping a bombo on their dome
**scholarbones** rises up to his foe, smacking them on the dome
**ArchAngel** hops on his bandwagon like how he hops from team to team
**Leek** puts on his supersuit, a perfect fit
special.message-effect: took an additional 30 damage in the name of BHM!

special.message: **HE'S DOING STRINGS!**
The stack grows larger in **Kshuewhatdamoo's** hands!
**Jack** slips on the timbs, no socks???
He flips the hat backwards, time to get serious
**Plant** slipped on the wristband, it fits like a glove
**Chris** repeatedly bashes his opponents head in with the package
**Que el**- I mean **Queso**- BRO **QUZEL** EATS THE QUESADILLA
Rightio then,**Tim** hornswoggled out the blicky
**super_hats** eats the scab
**Bubbles** turns your life into a meme, say goodbye to your reputation
**Disco** starts blasting his beats out loud, your eardrums rupture

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Kaio crawls onto the battlefield, he's feeling hungry.**
events.attack: *He attempts to vore the duelists!*
events.miss: Mickey Mimic Kaio accidentally eats a fire hydrant and implodes!

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Disco causes a white women stampede!!**
events.attack: *The duelists attempt to evade*
events.miss: The white women turned on Mickey Mimic Disco and trampled him instead

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Chasem powerwalks onto the battlefield and pulls the pin**
events.attack: *A massive explosion erupts outwards!*
events.miss: Both duelists avoid the explosion and continue over Mickey Mimic Chasem's remains

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Jet sprints into battle while flailing his arms rapidly**
events.attack: *Like two wet noodles flipping about*
events.miss: Mickey Mimic Jet trips and then dies

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Pitinn falls from the sky like a meteor**
events.attack: *His massive dumpy crashes down with a shattering boom*
events.miss: Mickey Mimic Pitinn bounces off the ground and launches back into orbit

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Seraph warps onto the battlefield**
events.attack: *His anime theme starts to play as he draws his blade*
events.miss: He ends up cutting himself accidentally and bleeds out

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Bubbles calls in a ratio**
events.attack: *Deadly omegaluls rain down from the sky*
events.miss: It is too much to handle as Mickey Mimic Bubbles is buried alive instead

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Kshue forms an extremely rare W**
events.attack: *The duelists are baffled by this outcome*
events.miss: The duelists ignore Kshue and he just leaves

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Fortnite dickrides into battle**
events.attack: *He tosses lightspeed basketballs at the duelists*
events.miss: He misses every shot, just like the heat did against the bucks

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Steven rampages through the battlefield**
events.attack: *A war machine of unparalleled might*
events.miss: Both players miraculously survive as Steven's rampage travels to Jet's house

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Super_Hats constructs a nuclear meat mountain**
events.attack: *He attempts to force feed the duelists*
events.miss: He gets hungry and eats it himself, he dies

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Leek summons his Persona for battle!**
events.attack: *It's just Leek in a frozone costume, he launches an assault!*
events.miss: He ends up getting bored and goes to olive garden

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Nakk emerges from the woods!**
events.attack: *He T-Poses on the duelists, striking fear into their hearts*
events.miss: A sudden JRPG drops from the sky, saving the duelists as Nakk leaves

events.message: **Mickey Mimic M3D devours a can of beans!**
events.attack: *He attempts to summon forth a storm of shit*
events.miss: One of the duelists calls him M1D and he leaves in tears

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Nine walks onto the battlefield!**
events.attack: *A sea of vicious rats follows his every step*
events.miss: The duelists stay perfectly still until he's finally gone

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Gabe stinks up the air!**
events.attack: *The awful stench begins to strangle the duelists*
events.miss: Neeko announces she has a bf on twitter, Gabe falls to his knees and dies

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Enzo commits a drive-by!**
events.attack: *He's drifting while aiming out the window*
events.miss: He ends up drifting into a whataburger and explodes

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Senna floats onto the battlefield!**
events.attack: *He sucks dick y'all*
events.miss: A gateway opens underneath Mickey Mimic Senna that drags him to Brazil

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Stormblaze launches out of a cannon!**
events.attack: *His forehead is on course to crash into the battle!*
events.miss: He misses and flies into a nearby town, reducing it to atoms

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Skinner comes marching in!**
events.attack: *He's complaining about Hook with screeching volume!*
events.miss: Hook miraculously boots on time and he stops screaming

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Juicy summons his troops!**
events.attack: *He's the commander of the feet fleet*
events.miss: He gets distracted by the hub and takes his leave

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Hook boots up onto the field!**
events.attack: *He starts tossing labels, one more frfr*
events.miss: His stomach rumbles as he leaves to go to the bathroom, never to be seen again

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Kerra slowly approaches!**
events.attack: *Extremely slow, one step per hour*
events.miss: He turns to dust before anything can happen

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Kunai dashes onto the scene!**
events.attack: *A sea of blades starts rushing through the air*
events.miss: A ping from the selfie channel distracts Kunai, he's needed elsewhere

events.message: **Mickey Mimic ChrisB walks ahead!**
events.attack: *He doesn't really do much, at all*
events.miss: He just keeps walking until he's out of sight

events.message: **Mickey Mimic DarkSlash emerges from the ground!**
events.attack: *He channels his negative luck into a massive attack*
events.miss: A text from his roommate hinders his focus, causing the energy to erase him instead

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Hank Flowers drives into battle!**
events.attack: *He starts throwing doordash items at the duelists*
events.miss: The duelists don't leave a tip and he quits the job forever

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Obm's voice booms through the air!**
events.attack: *He needs head and he needs it now*
events.miss: a brave soul volunteers from out of the blue, as the duelists are spared

events.message: **Mickey Mimic McLovin pulls out the spitfire!**
events.attack: *You gotta love mags bro*
events.miss: He misses every shot, a faint **HELLO?** can be heard in the distance

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Tron equips his visor!**
events.attack: *The power of a thousand ratios charges from within*
events.miss: While charging he spots a nearby lake, he decides to go fishing instead

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Bar_Bar is ready for action!**
events.attack: *His hitbox has the power to control fate itself*
events.miss: He ends up dropping the combo and spikes his controller into the dirt

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Plant is ready to brawl!**
events.attack: *They call him the dragon of IKEA*
events.miss: While trying to remove his shirt he accidentally strangles himself and perishes

events.message: **Mickey Mimic VHS pulls out the megaphone!**
events.attack: *The word Slag ruptures out multiple times*
events.miss: An alert broadcasts that the Queen has died, VHS turns to stone

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Eternal cheers on the duelists!**
events.attack: *He's clapping his hands too, what a good man*
events.miss: The duelists have grown stronger thanks to Eternal's aid

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Yenice finally wakes up!**
events.attack: *He's violent while he's hungover*
events.miss: His head is booming too hard, he goes back to sleep

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Placeholder takes up a stance!**
events.attack: *He starts throwing out electrics like crazy*
events.miss: Tekken 8 was finally released, he korean backdashes out of view

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Quzel appears out of thin air!**
events.attack: *Nobody really knows what he's capable of*
events.miss: He vanishes once again, doing absolutely nothing

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Trashboat steers his boat through the battle!**
events.attack: *Rumor says he's searching for the one piece*
events.miss: He sinks his ship while trying to fistbump the duelists

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Nugget says what's up!**
events.attack: *He's waiting for an answer, patiently*
events.miss: Nobody answers, he decides to go bomb Hats house

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Jesse pulls up to scrap!**
events.attack: *He's got a lot of homework so he can't really stay long*
events.miss: He leaves after 24 seconds to go do homework

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Trazac plows through the battlefield!**
events.attack: *His tractor is made out of solid gold*
events.miss: He bullies the duelists till he's bored and then goes back to the ranch

events.message: **Lightning strikes down as LowTierGod appears in the sky!**
events.attack: *The duelists look up like the summer ants they are*
events.miss: By the grace of Allah the duelists are spared as LTG rage quits

events.message: **The sound of a train whistle can be heard closing in**
events.attack: *The Ghost of Seraph's Hatred is piloting it*
events.miss: The train ignores the duelists as it manuevers into the Culvers Drive-thru

events.message: **Bum1six3 is live on twitch!**
events.attack: *He's about to have a real talk*
events.miss: The duelists offer up their twitch primes as Bum grants them mercy

events.message: **Mickey Mimic Str8Stripping edits himself in!**
events.attack: *He hasn't slept in thirty-six hours, don't set him off*
events.miss: Hook forgot to pay him again, his soul leaves his body for good
